hero.headline: Championing Cardano's community-led governance
hero.description: Until a final Cardano Constitution has been developed and ratified by the community - a programme of consultation taking place throughout 2024 - a set of interim rules is required to support the transition.

signIn.headline: Sign In
signIn.description: A magic link will be sent to the email address provided. This may take a few minutes.

signUp.headline: Complete your registration
signUp.description: You will be using your email to sign in

hotCredential.label: Hot Credential
hotCredential.tooltip: At least one hot credential is required for on-chain activity data to be tracked and displayed on the portal

signOut.headline: Sign Out
signOut.description: Are you sure you want to Sign out?

deleteRole.headline: Change status
deleteRole.description: Are you sure you want to change the status?

deleteUser.headline: Delete user

switchUserStatus.description: Are you sure you want to change the status?

uploadConstitution.headline: Upload new version of Constitution
uploadConstitution.description: Please upload the new version of the constitution.

addRationale.headline: Add rationale
addRationale.description: Please provide rationale for your vote on specific governance action.

rationaleLink.headline: Rationale link
rationaleLink.description: Attach this link to your vote

previewRationale.description: Please update rationale for your vote on specific governance action.

TopBanner.message: This version of the Constitutional Committee Portal is for testing & previewing new features. NONE of the information contained herein comes from Cardano MainNet
